website_summaries.verdict: A conveniently sized dishwasher with an adjustable rack to accommodate larger dishes.
pros: SPT's portable 18-inch dishwasher features 6 wash programs ranging from a heavy cycle to a speed cycle
This model has a delay start so you can schedule washing for periods when hot water is not otherwise in demand at your household
cons: There can be issues with an occasional leaking unit as well as some getting dented in transit

customer_reviews.title: Functionally good, and does a good job BUT... BUYER BEWARE.
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE! This dishwasher is a good choice - it's my 2nd. The first one failed after two years of constant daily use. During that time it always worked well but the top surface became swollen and delaminated. Despite that issue, I bought a new one and within a month the same thing happened - the top surface has already swollen up, split badly on the left side and delaminated. Since it was just a month old I contacted the vendor who refused to replace the defective machine.
customer_reviews.author: Green Guy 33068

customer_reviews.title: The package arrived intact, but when I got it ...
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived intact, but when I got it out of the shipping box, there were dents on the door and when you open up the dishwasher, on the inside of the door, there is a dent there as well. Apparently there is no quality control with this company. I went to use it to see how it worked. Surprisingly it worked well. After 3 uses though, it started to leak around the door seal. The only program setting that does not leak on is the rinse cycle. Unfortunately, I destroyed all the boxes and at present, am unable to send this back.
customer_reviews.author: Trent Presser

customer_reviews.title: Does not work and manufacturer is unreachable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dishwasher because I dont have the Time to fix our old one and it was inoperable. This one arrived on time, but does not work. I have been trying to get this resolved and can't get through to the manufacturer, the store Store123 referred me to the manufacturer. I have yet to get an email from the manufacturer too. I have gone online to find a solution myself, got at least as far and getting it running, by pressing the start button before the power on, but I can't get the front panel to stop glitching out. I am not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Branch

customer_reviews.title: Nice dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Needed portable dishwasher for small kitchen. This does excellent job and looks good. Interior design allows to adjust for all sizes dishes, pots and pans. Fits a lot for small size. Program feature that allows to set time for start is great. Disappointed that it arrived with big dent in door. Co. very nice to work with and they are sending replacement door.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A Greb

customer_reviews.title: So glad we bought this
customer_reviews.text: So glad we bought this. Our old one lasted years but you could hear it anywhere in the house when it was running. Now that there are only two of us living here, this is the perfect size. It works fantastic and runs so quietly. One reviewer complained about having to start it over if they open the door, all you have to do is pause the cycle and you can open the door then hit start again and it continues. A really good dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea   Raab

customer_reviews.title: Took a chance and this worked out
customer_reviews.text: Took a big chance ordering this dishwasher online sight unseen. Very satisfied with this purchase. We learned something about it by using it. You need to leave it plugged in for a long time after the cycle has stopped to allow the dishes to finish drying. At first we thought the dryer was broken, but it was not. We were just not allowing enough time to dry. This was a great purchase! Item arrived in great shape and suits our purposes well, as we have a small kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Fortune

customer_reviews.title: If it were easy I’d return it
customer_reviews.text: If you’ve had a built in dishwasher before, this dishwasher will not do. The restrictive stacking, connecting via the sink faucet and the poor cleanliness of the dishes make this a poor purchase. If it was easy to do I would return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died after a year and a half
customer_reviews.text: I did rate this 5 star, but within a year and a half of purchase the whole thing is dead. At first their customer support did nothing to help but after complaining this dishwasher had seen issues within the first year(separate problem) as well they decided to send me a new pump, that was all no help diagnosing what was wrong or figuring out if this was the right part. Painstakingly installed the new pump and it still doesn't work, gets stuck in 'draining mode' until it errors out. Will never by PNT product again. Hundreds of dollars wasted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you don't have one you need one.
customer_reviews.text: I have got to say I was debating on getting one for months but I finally broke from hand washing dishes. When you work a full time job and have two kids you just got to cut back on time somewere. I LOVE IT easy to use saves me an extra hour or so a day I promise you you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Kline

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for quite a while at this point. Longer than a year if I remember correctly. Maybe two years. It's almost exactly half the size of my previous, 'full-sized' dishwasher. I was concerned that 1) it wouldn't last and 2) I'd have to run it every night because it was so small. Neither is true. It's held up like a champ. Holds a surprising amount of dirty dishes. Additionally, it has some nice little features that allow it to be configured for large items and gives you a place for like large knives or spatulas. I think my only complaint would be that there isn't a way to not have a dry cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Reen

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great product -- easy set up, cleans very well and runs VERY quietly. It's small, but that should be obvious from the dimensions in the product info, and it suits my needs well. Great customer service. The dishwasher arrived with a broken wheel. A quick call to a very helpful customer service rep at the manufacturer resolved the issue completely. (Thanks, Bridget!) They shipped out a replacement wheel, which arrived in three days, e-mailed me instructions regarding how to replace the wheel and I was able to do it myself with about 15 minutes of work.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Plumbs only via faucet, but solid!
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4stars bc it arrived w a broken wheel. Customer service was very friendly and helpful but it was a ridiculous task to take apart machine and replace wheel. It should have been a return and replace situation. Works very well however.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Hickman Young

customer_reviews.title: No more hand washing dinner dishes!
customer_reviews.text: So very happy! It arrived in perfect condition. It was well packed, no dents and nothing broken. The hardest part was getting a faucet that it could attach to. I knew it wouldn't work with my pull-down sprayer. But I thought I could make it work... Several trips later, I am happy with my new faucet. And after hand washing dishes for 16 years I am enjoying using this dishwasher much more than I should. It works much better than the one that we removed years ago. The smaller size is great as it doesn't take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: SPT Energy Star Portable Dishwasher.
customer_reviews.text: We live in a 2 bedroom, 2 bath apartment in Senior Living. We have a dining room, but we do have company and I hate using paper plates. I hated more having to now after always having a dishwasher, to start doing dishes by hand. I absolutely love my portable dishwasher. It cleans extremely well and has little to almost no noise when running. I am so happy with it and glad I bought it. Dottie B
customer_reviews.author: Dottie

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase, if you are like us and didn't have a dishwasher in your kitchen and have a family of 5 well you know that a dishwasher is essential. I contemplated this buy for a while especially since it would be shipped but we have had it for 3 years now with no issues. The only thing I would recommend is to buy a different adapter for the faucet then it comes with because it gets clogged super easy and ours did not thread nicely into the faucet. If you can't find an adapter at your local hardware store you can find ones here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: The dishwasher looked perfect. We couldn’t get it to work. I’m not sure if it was on our end or the actual product. Very easy to hook up and practically no assembly required. We could only get ours to beep. We were able to receive a refund though. I don’t want to leave a bad review because I’m honestly not sure what the issue was. It definitely looked great and customer service was quick and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Michaelyn Rawlings

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Have to make sure not to put large plates where they can interfere with the detergent flap (though it's the best spot for large plates). I usually have to run it on heavy-duty mode to get everything clean, and the timer for this mode isn't accurate (shows 2:05 on the timer, but it actually takes 3 hours.) It's pretty quiet overall, and gives off a series of loud beeps when it's done.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen C.

customer_reviews.title: Faithful product
customer_reviews.text: We've had this product for almost over 2 years. It has been very faithful. We have very hard water and had to do a deep cleaning once. The wash cycles perform as expected. Its easy to roll and hook up. I'm very satisfied. When it came it was dented in the front a bit. We would have sent it back but the re-packaging would have been too hard for us. The dents were slight. If you're really picky carefully unpack the item because it is packed to the hilt when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Jo A.

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: It cleans our dishes thoroughly, and even pots and pans. It's easy to move around the dividers inside the machine to accommodate the varying shapes and sizes. It's easy to hook up to the sink and power. We've had no leaks, drips, or other problems. It's small, so don't expect it to fit everything that a full sized machine would, but it's perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi S.

customer_reviews.title: Love IT !!!
customer_reviews.text: Since I live alone, I decided to get this dishwasher due to my busy work schedule. I was pleasantly surprised on how well it cleaned my dishes. After scrapping off the large food particles, I place the dishes in without rinsing them off, including a frying pan with with cooked on particles. All of my dishes come out sparkling clean. I'm so thrilled I bought it. It is also super quiet! I usually don't give reviews for products I purchase through amazon, but this product was a must. It was a great investment!!!!
customer_reviews.author: sue zook

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: 1st week I had this product anddddddd I haven't washed not one dish. Being as my time in this world is more important than money spent, it already paid for itself. Go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Seeley

customer_reviews.title: This is the best 18" dishwasher I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best 18" dishwasher I've ever used. It really cleans everything up. The time cycles are a bit long even the shortest one, but It does a good job. My biggest issue with it is that the self drying functionality is on the weaker side. Still I don't think you will find a better unit this size at least not on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: moses

customer_reviews.title: I needed a portable solution and this is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Small dishwasher that does what it says it will do. Very easy to roll around on my linoleum floor and top is perfect height to use as additional countertop space. In fact I had a piece of Corian countertop left over from counter install and replace the top on the dishwasher with the Corian top for a perfect matching top. If you have no space for built-in dishwasher this is a very good choice and it cleans dishes, pans, and flatware beautifully. i use the Costco branded dishwashing pods and I always use the all-in- one setting which takes about two hours, and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: John Mahan

customer_reviews.title: Clean forks!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this dishwasher for 2 years and it has worked very well. I use the cheapest powdered detergent, and dishes and utensils come out spotless, even with the shortest cycle. The door was dented but that issue fell to the manufacturer because it was packed in 3 thick boxes with no outside damage. Amazon discounted the price.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without this?
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome little dishwasher. I fought getting a dishwasher because I don't have much room for one but I don't know how I lived without it. I work A LOT and there were always small amounts of dishes littering the counter and sink because I didn't have time to wash them. Now I simply put them in the dishwasher until it's full and wash away!! It's small which is a plus for me because I don't have a lot of dishes yet I can fit large pans in there when I have them. LOVE this!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Endthoff

customer_reviews.title: just wish the wheels rolled a little better. It doesn't roll smoothly and it always wants ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a dent on the front, but I can live with that. It works well, just wish the wheels rolled a little better. It doesn't roll smoothly and it always wants to go diagonally. It runs quietly though and my dishes come out clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J. March

customer_reviews.title: Biggest regret of my like
customer_reviews.text: I hate this dishwasher, I regret purchasing this dishwasher. It doesn’t wash properly nor does it dry the dishes, I would never recommend this dishwasher to ANYONE, it hasn’t even been a year since I purchase this dishwasher and it’s not draining the water I’m so overwhelmed with the money I wasted to purchase this junk buyers BEWARE!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nordia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I love my new mini portable dishwasher. It's everything the advertised post says. It came with the faucet attachment (it fits male or female ends, you may need to remove a washer). One small ding on the bottom of the face of the door but nothing I can't live with. Good directions on how to use. So far, so good. I hope it stays that way as it is the perfect size for what I had available.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie A. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: It is small but mighty dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. We have a small kitchen. This dishwasher cleans well. I am able to fit a large crockpot insert into the dishwasher. I have had no issues with the washer. I would recommend it. It being as small as it is makes it easier to negotiate around when it is connected to the plug and faucet. Our previous washer was larger, it had no hand holds to move it around but this model has to recess at the top back to be able to get a good hand hold to move it about.
customer_reviews.author: Rho

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Bag
customer_reviews.text: Loved It! until today. Have had it less than 3-months and it is leaking! They sent me a new pump with install instructions I didn't understand. With help from u tube and the guy at Lowes, had to buy clamps, I got it replaced myself. It's now been 10-months without any issues. I love the dishwasher design and size.
customer_reviews.author: CandisaJ

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It does a really great job
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It does a really great job. There are only two of us in my home and it is the perfect size for the amount of dishes I dirty during the day. It even fits the pots and pans I use when cooking dinner. It has different settings. I use all in one tables, and the dishwasher has a setting for their use. I think it would be great for anyone who has limited space, or for just a couple.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: They ALL came out super clean and mostly dry
customer_reviews.text: First day I had it I ran 2 loads of dried yucky dishes. I chose NOT to rinse them off just to see how well the washer did on them. They ALL came out super clean and mostly dry! It did a FANTASTIC job! My brother has one too and he highly recommended it and now I see why. It did however have a small dent in the front when delivered but just the thought of shipping this thing back made me accept the flaw! :)
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Great dishwasher.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great portable dishwasher. It’s pretty heavy and the open door supports the weight of my beagles front paws as I load the dishwasher. As of December 2019 I’ve been using this weekly for about two years now. This washes dishes as well as a permanent dishwasher so no complaints here. A full cycle takes about two hours so you would probably want to fire it up before going to bed so it’s not in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: ... over a year now and I have been very happy. It has been very dependable and does a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this for over a year now and I have been very happy. It has been very dependable and does a good job! Perfect for just 2 or 3 people.
customer_reviews.author: JGriffin

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WORKING
customer_reviews.text: This portable dishwasher was just what we was looking for. It does a great job getting dies spotless but is a bit noisey especially when it drains,sounds like hose has broke!!
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: It’s not a very powerful washer, my dishes still come out dirty it’s really small the carts are super little
customer_reviews.author: Diannadavila

customer_reviews.title: Awesome totally awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works great! ! Awesome small dishwasher. Compact, does the job, low water consumption, and best rated on 3rd party websites . No regrets, best purchase on amazon for me in 2018, especially since I HATE DOING DISHES. ..
customer_reviews.author: The Dougie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have a small kitchen and had no space in install a dishwasher. I keep this in my laundry room and roll it out as needed. You can fit a good bit of dishes in it and it cleans very well!! Spotless! Better than any dishwasher I've ever had. Very easy to hook up to the faucet. Just turn the water on press start and let it run. Love it love it!
customer_reviews.author: sarahsue123

customer_reviews.title: GREAT UNIT FOR SINGLE PERSON OR COUPLE,,, MAYBE FOR SINGLE FATHER OR MOTHER with 1 or 2 small children
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small unit for my kitchen,,,, however to small if you are cooking for even a small family...for me it is adequate but, If you use a lot of pots for cooking not big enough.... The cleaning cycle is very quiet and does a great job of cleaning (even silverware is sparkling and no food stains). Awesome for cleaning and very easy. Just use the manual button and don't forget to open the water valve (turn on the faucet)... I would buy again Definitely !!!
customer_reviews.author: Harry L

customer_reviews.title: Great for my APT!
customer_reviews.text: Dude. This dishwasher is awesome! It's small enough for my apartment but big enough for a decent load of dishes! Came very well packaged. So far no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Heather Moore

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love finally having a dishwasher. Its so easy to use and gets the dishes clean. Only thing I would change is creating a bigger portable dishwasher. Other then that love it
customer_reviews.author: Tanya L. Weir

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: adapter doesn't fit,spent time,and gas to TRY and find one.Had to change my faucet BUT it is so great to have a marvelous working dishwasher, hopefully I will remember to update in a couple months small with a good punch
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend of mine who has a teeny kitchen. He was always doing dished by hand (when he did) so got this for him. Showed him how to hook it up and ran a cycle. Very easy to use; compact; cleans great. Now he doesn't know if he could ever go back to doing dished by hand. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Harris

customer_reviews.title: This is a really great item. It cleans dishes thoroughly and is extremely ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great item. It cleans dishes thoroughly and is extremely sturdy. We have used it for over three years and it is still going!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small home
customer_reviews.text: Great item for a two family home. Pro: compact size makes it great for a small kitchen. Washes 6 piece dinnerware set, which is great for our small home. Gets dishes really clean. Con: Does not dry the dishes as a normal dishwasher does. You have to prop the door open after they wash to air dry them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gant

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't dry
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't clean anything dried on, and leaves water spots even with rinse aid. Doesn't dry, at all only air dry if you open it and pull racks out
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: in less then a year there was a whole in the hose and leaked.
customer_reviews.text: package was dented and torn when we received it and the bottom left was slightly dented. It worked fine and then started to leek. the hose has a whole in it now and we cannot use it.
customer_reviews.author: brenda heitzman

customer_reviews.title: Received unit with sand inside and out the unit. ...
customer_reviews.text: Received unit with sand inside and out the unit. The wheel jammed up and one is crooked or damaged so cant push around too much !!! VENDOR!!! Please send me upgraded wheel before unit tilt over and hurt someone!!!! I wanted to returned but package was too heavy. It does washed the dishes clean though.
customer_reviews.author: CW Hwang

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a lifesaver for parents in an apartment!
customer_reviews.text: We don't have a huge apartment so we couldn't fit a full size dishwasher without getting rid of cabinet space, instead we got this one and it has helped take the load off of our backs being busy parents.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Caridi

customer_reviews.title: What a powerhouse!
customer_reviews.text: This is a magnificent dishwasher! It is so sleek and easy to use. The dishes come out sparkling and completely dry. I'm using it as a portable and it provides additional "counter" space.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hesson

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my granddaughter. She "RAVES" about how well it does the job, and how much time it saves her instead of washing dishes manually.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Came on time and with no damage. Fits perfectly in space allotted and runs quieter than expected. Fits just enough dishes. Will upgrade my review over time about its performance.
customer_reviews.author: Baron

customer_reviews.title: Huge Disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get all The dishes clean and glasses won’t come Clean if they have anything at all in them , like dried milk or chocolate milk you’ll might as well wash by hand. Big disappointment! Wasted my 500.00 dollars
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: Only good as portable no stationary unit.
customer_reviews.text: No filter system, does not grind up waste washed from dishes. Hook up for sink not standard builtin dishwasher as waste water return is builtin to filling apparatus.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in pristine condition. Set up, plugged in ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in pristine condition. Set up, plugged in, ran a rinse cycle, it leaked. 😢. Return was SO uncomplicated and refund was almost immediate. Decided it was smaller than I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Eftyhia Nassos

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money, the door bowed the first time we used it & one of the wheels snapped off already. We bought this because I was very I'll & needed surgery & couldn't do dishes. I still have 1 more surgery to go & broken dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Conner

customer_reviews.title: ... machine cleaned the dishes well and I was very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This machine cleaned the dishes well and I was very happy with it, but it was completely inoperable after a couple of months. The controls wouldn't light up at all, so I figured it was just a fuse. The problem is, this unit doesn't have any stand-alone fuses. No protection at all, so it will blow a control board. Thankfully I still had time to return it for free through Amazon. A couple more weeks and I would have been dealing with a headache.
customer_reviews.author: JCLouisiana

customer_reviews.title: I returned it because I spent a lot of money on it and it came damaged
customer_reviews.text: I returned it because I spent a lot of money on it and it came damaged
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY. This item was broken when I ...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED REVIEW: This item did not work upon receipt. I spent the extra $10 on a GE portable washer from Home Depot while attempting to get refunded for this item. The GE is significantly bigger, washes better, and much shorter wash cycle (the SPT takes 2 hours vs about 45minutes for the GE!). DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM Despite the trouble getting refunded from the manufacturer, Amazon stepped in and refunded the full amount of the product. Kudos to Amazon for customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Gray

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: I've been hand washing my dishes for the past year and having this has changed my life haha. I've been bragging about it and showing it off to my friends like I'm a 1950s housewife. It works really well and it's great to use as another counter top for chopping. The drying isn't AMAZING, but it works. I'm definitely satisfied with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Works great very quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Was nervous about having a kitchen appliance delivered. Was very well packaged to protect your investment. Worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff  S

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this dishwasher!! Lots of nice little perks. Delivered right to my doorstep and was all put together. I only had to wrestle it into the house and was washing dishes right away. Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: KLenox

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well and fits the space, easy to move
customer_reviews.text: Nice dishwasher with a small profile. Fits well in my studio apartment. Excellent cleaning power but sometimes a little difficult to load square dishes and bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: bad
customer_reviews.text: bought it for my daughters apartment worked once not after contacted company sent new part worked 3 times then stopped and when it did work it did not clean dishes well at all
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Letson

customer_reviews.title: But for the most part it works just fine and haven't had any issues out of it
customer_reviews.text: It could be a bit bigger to fit larger pots and what not. But for the most part it works just fine and haven't had any issues out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Galco

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I'm really pleased with this purchase. Has run quite well and cleans thoroughly. Never having had a portable dishwasher before, I was surprised at how small the interior is (I had a smaller built-in before and this is even smaller). You can fit 6-7 mugs/glasses, tops. But I still manage to only have to run it about once a week and haven't had any problems with leaking or otherwise after about 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: PhillyKate7

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Washes good for now been using little over a month .
customer_reviews.author: Andre Lague

customer_reviews.title: Can't complain
customer_reviews.text: It came wet and smelling like mildew. I'm running a vinegar cycle as I type to get it right. No damage that I can see. Set up was simple as could be.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret buying this
customer_reviews.text: If this worked only half as well as it does I would have been ecstatic. Very well designed, solid contribution, holds a lot without taking up a lot of space, good instructions. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Damaged item inside intact box
customer_reviews.text: The box was completely intact . When I unwrapped the dishwasher, the lower section of the door was found bashed in and the plastic covering the hinge loose. I am requesting to return this product.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great small dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Came well packaged with no damage on arrival. Easy to set up and use. Quiet running. Gets the job done. Love the countdown timer.
customer_reviews.author: -e-

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my small home
customer_reviews.text: I love the compact design of this washer. It fits perfectly in my small kitchen and is easy to use. I have had ZERO problems with this washer! So happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mathes Family

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Works great, doesn't dry dishes tho..I have to open door and pull racks out over night..
customer_reviews.author: Liz Olson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my tiny kitchen! I live in a rental with a tiny kitchen and this has made my life so much easier. I have it tucked out of the way until its ready to run.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Chaires

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for two people. Best quality ever. Works wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: Billie Celmer

customer_reviews.title: Works great although slightly damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Product works great. However the wood top did have some damage upon arrival. Being such a big item I didn’t want to send it back over something that didn’t effect the performance. Shop ladder was quick to resolve the issue and offered me a partial refund for the damages.
customer_reviews.author: Jayce

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It really washes dishes well.. I am very pleased with this dishwasher...
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful appliance!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived yesterday, getting it hooked up too the sink was a breeze, easy to wheel around your kitchen if storage area isn't right next to your sink! And it washes beautifully! (: 10/10 recommend to anyone looking for a portable dishwasher! Also, love the timer!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to a compact kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This dishwasher is perfect for a compact kitchen. It runs quietly. You can fit more dishes than you might think in it. And the dishes come out clean. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel T.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the result of clean dishes
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable product. Saves us lots of time. No leak at all, but I used some white insulations tapes on faucet adaptor in order to achieve this leak-free state. Very happy with the result of clean dishes!
customer_reviews.author: Suvari

customer_reviews.title: Works fairly well. The bottom plate rack won't stay ...
customer_reviews.text: Works fairly well. The bottom plate rack won't stay up .Takes a long time to wash 155 minutes. Is quiet
customer_reviews.author: Dana Kofford

customer_reviews.title: actually cleans very well
customer_reviews.text: Gets my dishes really clean for a portable dishwasher. Really impressed. I love how the cord and tubes can be tucked into the back of the machine when not using it....its sort of like those hairdryers with the retractable cord.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t dry
customer_reviews.text: The dishwasher washes ok but doesn’t dry and it arrived a bit banged up. Cycles are all the same. Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: GC Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Works great, it did come with some minor dents but ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, it did come with some minor dents but nothing obvious enough that I would go through the trouble of shipping it back. Came ready to hook up.
customer_reviews.author: ErikH.

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever made!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is one of the best thing I ever Baught I live in an apartment so I dot. Have a dishwasher so I purchased this portable dishwasher and it amazing makes my mom job way easier! Also it come with all the setups you need far as plugs and adapters.
customer_reviews.author: tari

customer_reviews.title: Not a very good maid
customer_reviews.text: Does not clean my dishes on the first second or third run. Have to hand wash then use dish washer.
customer_reviews.author: You're not serious!

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful addition to our home.
customer_reviews.text: Love this dishwasher. It works great and is a welcome addition to our small home.
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The product didn’t fit my kitchen sink but it hooked up to my bathroom sink easily. It’s quiet and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This dishwasher works great! It's very quiet and my dishes come out nice and clean. The dishwasher fits more dishes than what I thought. I had to buy a part to connect it to my pull-down faucet, but it was only about $4 (ordered it on Amazon, too)....no big deal. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ms_tery

customer_reviews.title: Tickled pink!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this dishwasher. It is sturdy and powerful and was easy to connect (after watching a YouTube video on the subject). I was pleased that it came fully assembled with the casters in place. I have no complaints about the time of the cycle or leaks or noise level.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: "In Love"
customer_reviews.text: I love this little dishwasher! It holds surprisingly more than I expected and It's much quieter than some of the bigger washers I've used!.
customer_reviews.author: D Jane

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but terrific
customer_reviews.text: It’s definitely smaller than a standard, installed unit, but it is wonderful in a rental without another option. Works great. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great but small
customer_reviews.text: I have a pull down faucet so it took an extra 3 weeks for me to figure out the exact pieces that would work to connect it but once that was done it's an awesome product
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Gavin-Rosaliano

customer_reviews.title: Great Dishwasher!  (so far)
customer_reviews.text: Still in the Honeymoon phase but so far I love this dishwasher. Very quiet. Gets stuff clean. Fits in my small space. Easy enough to move around and hook up. Holds about 3 times as much as my old counter-top model. If it lasts a reasonable amount of time, it may be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: M. Hall

customer_reviews.title: 3 month lifespan
customer_reviews.text: Broke within 3 months. I did not receive a reply to several attempts to get in touch regarding the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: horrible, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I've replaced every single part, and it still doesn't work. It stopped working about 6 months after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my portable dishwashers....cleans real well quiet fits alot of dishes for family of two
customer_reviews.author: Gregre

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small kitchens that do not have a built-in dishwasher!
customer_reviews.text: First machine was DOA due to being dropped in the warehouse or in while in transit. Customer support was quick to respond and efficient with the return. Second machine works like a charm! Saves space and has configurations for light, regular and heavy wash cycles. Dishes come out spotless (assuming you use Jet Dry or similar rinse agent)! My only gripe is that the dish separators (little vertical arms holding dishes in a row) are a bit close together which means bowls are a bit difficult to fit in any efficient manner, but that is not a big deal since the unit does not use much water per cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Immunetou

customer_reviews.title: Takes too long
customer_reviews.text: The normal setting for washing dishes takes 2 and 1/2 hours.....way too long! Cleans dishes well. No vent for steam to escape, seems cheaply made. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This little dishwasher works excellent. It is amazing how much fits in it. Just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Davids

product_meta.title: SPT SD-9241SS: Energy Star 18" Portable Dishwasher - Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Spacious cavity loads up to eight standard place settings. Features easy controls, durable stainless steel interior and water temperature up to 154°F. Quick connect to any kitchen faucet eliminates the need for direct plumbing or permanent installation. Features and Functions: Time Delay Feature: allows you to program operation at a later start time (1-24 hours); Error Alarm: displays fault codes; Rinse Aid Warning Indicator: refill reminder on rinse aid; Stainless Steel Interior; 6 Wash Programs: All-in-1, Heavy, Normal, Light , Rinse and Speed; Adjustable upper rack to accommodate larger plates/pots; Faucet adapter included for quick and simple connection; Automatic detergent and rinse agent dispenser; Up to 8 standard place settings;Energy Star; Input voltage: 120V / 60Hz; Energy consumption: 295kwh/yr.; Water consumption (normal cycle): 3.65 gallons; Power consumption: 110W; Noise level (normal): 55dB; Drain tube length: 3 ft. "Spacious cavity loads up to eight standard place settings. Features easy controls, durable stainless steel interior and water temperature up to 154°F. Quick connect to any kitchen faucet eliminates the need for direct plumbing or permanent installation. Features and Functions: Time Delay Feature: allows you to program operation at a later start time (1-24 hours); Error Alarm: displays fault codes; Rinse Aid Warning Indicator: refill reminder on rinse aid; Stainless Steel Interior; 6 Wash Programs: All-in-1, Heavy, Normal, Light , Rinse and Speed; Adjustable upper rack to accommodate larger plates/pots; Faucet adapter included for quick and simple connection; Automatic detergent and rinse agent dispenser; Up to 8 standard place settings;Energy Star; Input voltage: 120V / 60Hz; Energy consumption: 295kwh/yr.; Water consumption (normal cycle): 3.65 gallons; Power consumption: 110W; Noise level (normal): 55dB; Drain tube length: 3 ft. Our faucet adapter fits standard size Aerator openings for both the male and female connections. The sizes: Male 15/16""; Female 55/64"". As long as your faucet has a removable Aerator they should be able to connect the faucet adapter. For a standard faucet head with a side/detached sprayer: While attached to the standard faucet, some detached sprayers will have water start coming out of them due to the line pressure. This is from the design of those faucets to redirect the water pressure from the main faucet head to the side sprayer. If you have a side sprayer, you will most likely need to install a water line that is separated from the sprayer."
feature_bullets: 6 Wash Programs: All-in-1, Heavy, Normal, Light , Rinse and Speed
Automatic detergent and rinse agent dispenser
Adjustable upper basket to accomodate large pots/plates
